Brief Description: Runs the experiment function that is currently selected in the NTB Session panel's 'Experiment' dropdown menu.
Stops the currently running experiment (without closing the onscreen window).
Runs an eye calibration routine based on the settings selected in the :ref:`Eye Calibration Settings GUI <NTB_EyeCalSettings>`.
Manually delivers liquid reward to the subject based on the settings selected in the :ref:`Reward Settings GUI <NTB_RewardSettings>`.
Play the audio file(s) selected in the :ref:`Audio Settings GUI <NTB_AudioSettings>`.
Present a movie / movies based on the settings in the :ref:`Movie Settings GUI <NTB_MovieExpSettings>`.
